title: Warren Says Powell ‘Failed’ as Leader
itunes:title: Warren Says Powell ‘Failed’ as Leader
description:
Barry Ostrowsky, President and CEO at RWJBarnabas Health, discusses managing Covid and getting a $100 million donation from the Cooperman Family. Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Matt Boesler explains why Senator Elizabeth Warren said revelations about investment transactions last year by Federal Reserve officials calls into question Jerome Powell's leadership of the U.S. central bank. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Legal Reporter Ellen Milligan share Ellen's Businessweek Magazine story Diversity at Elite Law Firms Is So Bad Clients Are Docking Fees. Bloomberg News Senior Correspondent Kyle Stock describes Rivian's long, messy road to its first electric pickup truck. And we Drive to the Close with Ann Miletti, Head of Active Equity at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
